### PR summary [bd6427c70d](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/pull/21976/commits/bd6427c70d95511d2cc32eace222b4fff96b1cd8)

#### Import changes for modified files

No significant changes to the import graph


<details><summary>Import changes for all files</summary>

|Files|Import difference|
|-|-|

</details>

---

#### Declarations diff

No declarations were harmed in the making of this PR! üêô
<details>
  <summary>You can run this locally as follows</summary>


```bash
## summary with just the declaration names:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh <optional_commit>

## more verbose report:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh long <optional_commit>
```
</details>

The doc-module for `script/declarations_diff.sh` contains some details about this script.

---

<details><summary>No changes to technical debt.</summary>

You can run this locally as
```
./scripts/technical-debt-metrics.sh pr_summary
```
* The `relative` value is the weighted *sum* of the differences with weight given by the *inverse* of the current value of the statistic.
* The `absolute` value is the `relative` value divided by the total sum of the inverses of the current values (i.e. the weighted *average* of the differences).
</details>

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/13404686270/job/37442386745)
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/13404686270/job/37442386505)

LGTM now. Thanks!

bors merge
Reviewed Archive until `Computability`: just a few comments. `CategoryTheory` has a few more single-component `cases'`.
Reviewed Archive until `Computability`: just a few comments. `CategoryTheory` has a few more single-component `cases'`.

LGTM now. Thanks!

bors merge
Let me flag this one, as it's more interesting.
Done.
Can you combine these adjacent lines into `rcases`? That would be rather more readable, I think.
Done.

More one-variable cases (no pun intended): perhaps worth discussing/was this discussed on zulip already?
I don't think these changes are *worse*, but I'm not convinced the current solution is ideal yet.
Done.
Can you combine with the the `rcases` on the next line, please?
Done.

Maybe
```suggestion
    Cones.ext (Iso.refl _) fun ‚ü®l‚ü© => by cases l; repeat simp
```
unless this is a quotient pattern.
Should have been replaced for the other category theory files touched.

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - chore: replace single-subgoal `cases'`
